    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the deliver thread. If the clock variable is null, then this thread is unicast_mode. It basically ignore the vector clock and print message immediately. If the clock is not null, then this thread is in causal_mode. It doesn't deliver the packet immediately. Each time this thread get signalled, it check the top packet. If the packet has expected packet (implemented by asExpected method of class VecterClock), then it deliver and update the shared clock within the critical section..
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable
